ttp_template:
<group name="date_dst_active_gmt_offset_time">
  time: {{TIME | ORPHRASE}}
  date: {{DATE | ORPHRASE}}
  time-zone-autodetect: {{TIME_ZONE_AUTODETECT | ORPHRASE}}
  time-zone-name: {{TIME_ZONE_NAME | ORPHRASE}}
  gmt-offset: {{GMT_OFFSET | ORPHRASE}}
  dst-active: {{DST_ACTIVE | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
time: 10:00:47
                  date: jul/21/2023
  time-zone-autodetect: yes
        time-zone-name: Europe/Moscow
            gmt-offset: +03:00
            dst-active: no
textfsm_template:
Value TIME (\d{2}\:\d{2}\:\d{2})
Value DATE ([a-z]{3}\/\d{2}\/\d{4})
Value TIME_ZONE_AUTODETECT (yes|no)
Value TIME_ZONE_NAME (\S+)
Value GMT_OFFSET (\+\d{2}\:\d{2})
Value DST_ACTIVE (yes|no)

Start
  ^\s*time:\s+${TIME}\s*$$
  ^\s*date:\s+${DATE}\s*$$
  ^\s*time-zone-autodetect:\s+${TIME_ZONE_AUTODETECT}\s*$$
  ^\s*time-zone-name:\s+${TIME_ZONE_NAME}\s*$$
  ^\s*gmt-offset:\s+${GMT_OFFSET}\s*$$
  ^\s*dst-active:\s+${DST_ACTIVE}\s*$$ -> Record
  ^\s*$$
  ^. -> Error
